name: Green Growth Brands Inc.
description: Green Growth Brands Inc. is an innovative company focused on the cannabis industry, dedicated to developing premium cannabis-infused products and retail experiences. Founded in 2018, the company has rapidly expanded its footprint by leveraging unique branding and a strong commitment to quality. Green Growth Brands operates several retail concepts, including 'The+Source', a cannabis dispensary chain that offers a wide range of cannabis products, including flowers, edibles, and concentrates. With a mission to promote the benefits of cannabis and provide customers with a safe, informative, and enjoyable shopping experience, the company emphasizes transparency and education in the cannabis sector. Green Growth Brands is also committed to sustainability, ensuring that its practices are environmentally friendly and socially responsible. The company’s product lines include various cannabinoid-infused items designed for wellness and lifestyle enhancement. By integrating cutting-edge technology and research, Green Growth Brands aims to set new standards in the cannabis industry while actively contributing to the evolving landscape of consumer preferences and regulatory frameworks. With a focus on growth and innovation, Green Growth Brands is positioned to become a leader in the cannabis market.

seo.meta_title: Green Growth Brands Inc. | Premium Cannabis Products and Retail
seo.meta_description: Explore Green Growth Brands Inc., a leader in the cannabis industry, offering premium cannabis-infused products and an exceptional retail experience.

faq.question: What does Green Growth Brands do?
faq.answer: Green Growth Brands develops and sells premium cannabis-infused products and operates cannabis retail stores.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Green Growth Brands?
faq.answer: Peter Horvath is the CEO of Green Growth Brands Inc.

faq.question: Where is Green Growth Brands headquartered?
faq.answer: Green Growth Brands is headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Green Growth Brands offer?
faq.answer: The company offers cannabis flowers, edibles, concentrates, and wellness products like CBD oils and gummies.

faq.question: When was Green Growth Brands founded?
faq.answer: Green Growth Brands was founded in 2018.
